name: Mango Basil Lemonade
preparation:
This simple and refreshing recipe brings together Hennessy V.S. cognac with an exotic pair of ingredients: mango and basil. It’s good for any summer occasion. But try multiplying the recipe and making a pitcher for a party on the patio.

Add all ingredients except soda water into a shaker and shake.

Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Top with soda water.

Garnish with a basil leaf and lemon wheel.
